short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen reader with integrated subway surfers gameplay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🙋‍♂️ "why install?"

Browsing the web is boring, i would much rather go on tiktok or yt shorts. This extension turns everything into easy to watch subway surfer gameplay.


👓 Seamless Integration with Chrome's Sidepanel

With a simple click, Subway Surfers Screen readers extracts text from any (most) website and overlays it on Subway Surfers gameplay.


🔊 Dynamic Text-to-Speech

Does reading make your brain hurty? No problem this extension uses text to speech to read for you


🤔 How work?

1. right click > click 'Read website'
or
1. select text > right click > click 'Read selection'
or
1. copy and past content here
then
2. press play to start tts (disables text area)
3. press stop to stop tts (enables text area)
